          <title>
            <string language="en">Conduction in molten and dissolved substances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übertragung in den flüssigen und aufgelösten 
Substanzen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conduction dans les substances fondues et 
dissoutes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Condução em substâncias derretidas e 
dissolvidas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conduzione in sostanze fuse e dissolte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διεξαγωγή στις λειωμένες και διαλυμένες ουσίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conducción en sustancias fundidas y disueltas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that some solid substances are insulators but if you melt them or dissolve them in water they become conductors.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">insulators</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lead bromide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">melting</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß einige feste 
Substanzen Isolierungen sind, aber, wenn Sie sie schmelzen oder sie im
Wasser auflösen, sie Leiter werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que quelques substances
pleines sont des isolateurs mais si vous les fondez ou les dissolvez 
dans l'eau ils deviennent des conducteurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que algumas substâncias
contínuas são isoladores mas se você os derreter ou os dissolver na
água se transformam condutores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che alcune sostanze 
solide sono isolanti ma se li fondete o li dissolvete in acqua si 
transformano in in conduttori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι μερικές στερεές 
ουσίες είναι μονωτές αλλά εάν τους λειώνετε ή τους διαλύετε 
στο ύδωρ γίνονται αγωγοί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que algunas sustancias 
sólidas son aisladores pero si usted los derrite o los disuelve en 
agua se convierten en conductores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrizität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Isolierungen</string>
          </keyword>
